amendment.description: To provide that certain funds be made available to the Alaska Fisheries Marketing Board to award grants to market, develop, and promote Alaska seafood and improve related technology and transportation with emphasis on wild salmon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 159 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1407) To provide that certain funds be made available to the Alaska Fisheries Marketing Board to award grants to market, develop, and promote Alaska seafood and improve related technology and transportation with emphasis on wild salmon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 159 proposed by Senator Stevens.
